title: Detective Husband I've Never Met
overview: Little Princess Gong Yi Yin was bestowed in marriage by the emperor to Qin Mo, the dream lover of countless girls. She was neglected on their wedding night. There was even news that the consort wanted to divorce her. Gong Yi Yin got angry and disguised herself as a man and went to Tingwei Court to be an official. She went to settle accounts with her husband, who she has never met before. And begin a game of him running and her chasing...
